list.textDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the language "{name}"? This will delete all content in this language and can not be undone!

detail.tooltipLanguageNotChoosable: You cannot use a language which is already inheriting from another language.
detail.tooltipIsoCodeNotChoosable: You can only select locales that are not in use already.
detail.tooltipInheritanceNotPossible: The system default language can not inherit from another language.
detail.textAlertChangeParent: Changing the parent language can lead to inconsistencies in your translations.
detail.textIsoCodeIsInUse: This ISO code is already in use.
detail.textLanguageHasParent: This language is already inheriting from another language.
